element.name: Stellar Flare
element.description:
1st-level Evocation Casting Time: 1 action Range: 60 feet Components: V, S Duration: Instantaneous
You hurl a mote of starlight at a creature you can see within range. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 2d8 radiant damage and is blinded until the end of your next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't blinded.

element.name: Lunar Shield
element.description:
2nd-level Abjuration Casting Time: 1 action Range: Self Components: V, S, M (a small silver mirror) Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute
You create a shimmering barrier of moonlight around yourself. For the duration, you have resistance to necrotic damage and advantage on saving throws against being charmed.

element.name: Astral Step
element.description:
3rd-level Conjuration Casting Time: 1 bonus action Range: Self Components: V Duration: Instantaneous
You step through a rift in space, teleporting to an unoccupied space you can see within 60 feet. You can bring along objects as long as their weight doesn’t exceed what you can carry. You can also teleport one willing creature of your size or smaller who is carrying gear up to its carrying capacity. The creature must be within 5 feet of you when you cast this spell, and there must be an unoccupied space within 5 feet of your destination space for the creature to appear in; otherwise, the creature is left behind.

element.name: Cosmic Beacon
element.description:
4th-level Divination Casting Time: 1 action Range: Self Components: V, S, M (a piece of meteorite) Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes
You create a beacon of cosmic light that guides you and your allies. For the duration, you and any allies within 30 feet of you have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and can’t be surprised. Additionally, you can use your reaction to grant an ally within 30 feet advantage on an attack roll or saving throw.

element.name: Radiant Burst
element.description:
5th-level Evocation Casting Time: 1 action Range: 150 feet Components: V, S Duration: Instantaneous
A burst of radiant energy erupts from a point you choose within range. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Constitution saving throw. A creature takes 8d6 radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Undead and fiends have disadvantage on this saving throw.
